readable.title: 3331525712_af1dcc47f2
readable.content: A fan sitting on someone 's shoulders is waving to a woman on a stage that says Amnesty International . A man in blue jeans is sitting on the shoulders of another person as he interacts with a woman performer onstage at a concert . A woman onstage points to a man holding up his hand A woman with a microphone on a stage points the microphone at a man who is standing in the audience in front of her Woman onstage at Amnesty International event exchanges gestures with man offstage .
